snippet: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 21 matches Saturday and stayed on course for a third straight Paris Masters title after beating Stan Wawrinka, 6-3, 3-6, 6-0.
abstract: Novak Djokovic beats Stan Wawrinka in Paris Masters semifinals; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 21 matches Saturday and stayed on course for a third straight Paris Masters title after beating Stan Wawrinka, 6-3, 3-6, 6-0.
